content: Can we put a publication request for the SMART ballot on the list for one of our FHIR-I quarters in Baltimore?

Discuss in Q2 today?
Constellation E - CQI, CDS, FHIR - JM

  • FHIR Clinical Reasoning ballot reconciliation
  • DEQM ballot reconciliation
  • Da Vinci update
That session seems to have a the right folks, but agenda is already a bit full.
Yeah -- we should just take this up in a FHIR-I quarter, rather than joint.
Will you post here when you decide when? @Isaac Vetter or I will want to be there.
Sure -- currently I'm thinking Wed Q1 if that'll okay with my co-chairs.
I've got an II FHIRcast update in Wed Q1, can it be Wed Q2 or Q4?
maybe the better question is: what are we actually talking about? Is it simply the publication process or are we finalizing content?
It's the publication request -- which I think means content as it stands.
(I'm not 100% sure on this though.)
content as it stands following WG review
Does/can "WG Review" happen subsequent to WG approving publication request?
I don't know.
probably not? We can probably do that overnbight
Needs a qa read through
But ready.
@Eric Haas Wait, are you saying we should vote to approve the publication request, or not, this morning?
IG draft is: https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/smart-app-launch/
Discuss: https://gforge.hl7.org/gf/project/fhir/tracker/?action=TrackerItemEdit&tracker_item_id=18296&start=0
Approve with understanding we will correct any typos, bad links ( history is pending a url) and any lingering qa issues.
Cool -- will plan to do that when @Isaac Vetter is around too (he can't make this quarter)
Can't do that
When you submit the publication request, the artifact needs to be in its final form

Cool -- will plan to do that when @Isaac Vetter is around too (he can't make this quarter)

Josh - thank you for including me! Sorry to be a bottleneck, when is convenient for you and other implementers?
